topics.body:
Trashy will get a kick outta this. Remember how I told you guys about how my step-dad has not only played but completed FF6?  This shit is gonna blow your feeble minds. Okay, for context. My step-dad called me over today because he needed some help. I went over there, and helped clean up the place. Afterwards we sat down and watched some TV. So a trailer for Age of Ultron comes on and he just spontaneously says "Every time they say Ultron I can't help but think of Ultraman." My eyes just go wide and I look at him and "Whaaa..." And he goes "Ultraman! The guy who grew giant and fought monsters and saved Japan. You don't know Ultraman?"  And at that point I go "I know Ultraman but how the fuck do YOU know Ultraman?" And he goes "I fucking LOVED Ultraman! I used to watch that shit all the time." And at that point my brain just exploded.

[spoiler]TL;DR My step-dad is an Ultraman fan![/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
